original_title: Shit's Totally FUCKED! What Can We Do?
overview: Freaked out by police? Pissed about ICE? Outraged at gentrification? What should we do? People are overwhelmed, pissed, and scared right now. This video is about how mutual aid projects are a way to plug into helping people and mobilizing for change. Check out the mutual aid toolkit at bigdoorbrigade.com for more inspiration and information about starting mutual aid projects where you live.
title: Shit's Totally FUCKED! What Can We Do?
